code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: shows significant small bowel congestion with necrosis, one adhesive band was found and lysed at the mid jejunum where it was fixed to the pelvic wall, a suspicious hard draining mesenteric lymph node was seen
2 cm retroperitoneal soft tissue mass obscuring the left psoas muscle

observation.value: shows significant small bowel congestion with necrosis, one adhesive band was found and lysed at the mid jejunum where it was fixed to the pelvic wall, a suspicious hard draining mesenteric lymph node was seen
2 cm retroperitoneal soft tissue mass obscuring the left psoas muscle

td.content: s:a 21 YO white female chemical technologist complains of critical denial of vomiting x 8 days. NKDA. Patient does not smoke o:Height 153 cm, Weight 63.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Skin = warm, dry a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:a female aged 21 years presents with 12 days history of worsening critical denial of night sweats, critical denial of vomiting, critical denial of constipation and Cancer. denies any smoking o:Height 154 cm, Weight 63.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17, Skin = warm, dry a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered exploratory laparotomy.

s:23 yo female presents with moderate wheezing associated with food intake, moderate flushing. she has history of moderate diarrhea. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 62.2 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 15, Skin = facial flushing, Skin = scattered facial telangiectasias a:Small Bowel Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Oxaliplatin - 85 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 200 mg IV, FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg bolus, and ordered CT Abdomen.
